Hi, I'm Joshua. I'm a programmer in New York City. I like working with video games, embedded systems, and Web projects like this site. I also enjoy sea creatures, the piano, and long-form YouTube video essays.


If you'd like to get in touch, you can e-mail me at joshua@centipeda.cc.

Nothing to see here.
